Welcome to the world of royalty-free music clips!

You can instantly buy and download royalty free music clips for your next project. We offer a selection of different royalty free music licensing to meet your project's unique needs, from explainer videos to mobile apps to television broadcast and everything in between.

Background music is not just for film and video productions, it is also used for underscoring mobile apps and games. The right background tune or music clip makes your information stick and provides an emotional connection with the audience.

AudioJungle has one of the world's largest, high-quality collections of music tracks to make any project sound right. From vocals to cinematic, ambient to experimental and beyond, creating the right mood for your project will drive your message home in a memorable way.

AudioJungle's library is full of great sounds, we're sure you'll find something perfect for your project. To make it easier for you, here a couple of links to help you navigate our extensive library: Stock audio, Hip Hop beats and music packs. You'll surely find the audio that suits your project.

How does this sound? An overview of our Music collection

Welcome to the world of royalty-free music clips! AudioJungle has one of the world's largest, high-quality collection of tracks to make any project sound right. From upbeat to cinematic, from dramatic to World Music and beyond. There's over two hundred thousand professionally-produced stock music tracks to choose from.

And the collection keeps growing! These days, background music is not only playing a powerful role in film and video, but also underscoring mobile apps and games. Ever thought about that?

Choosing a piece of music is vital to creating the right mood and emotion for your project and driving your message home in a memorable way. It's been scientifically proven that using music increases the effectiveness of videos and advertisements. Not only does the right background tune make your information stick, but it also provides an emotional connection. A connection that will make listeners much more likely to take action.

So if you're looking to build some excitement around your new business or product, why not try something upbeat from our corporate and motivational category?

How about a little drama to keep your audience on the edge of their seats? And check out our massive collection of cinematic music too-it's full of great tunes, we're sure you'll find something perfect for your project.

Or perhaps you need a reason for the season? We've got music that's sure to bring that Christmas cheer, or Halloween fear, whichever time of the year it may be!

If you need some help to tell your story in words, we've got plenty of tracks with both music and lyrics along with awesome vocals and harmonies. Or if you already have your own voice over, choose from our vast library of background tracks and instrumental underscores. Either way, there's all kinds of useful filters to help you narrow down your selection and find the right track fast. You can easily hone your search for music with vocals or without, or pick the tempo that best fits the pace and energy of your project.

Our creative community's music is often featured in big famous projects. We're talking about big brands like Sony, L'Oreal Paris, Reebok, Citroen, Nike, American Express, BMW, Mitsubishi, Lexus, Uber, National Geographic, Walmart, Asus, The Salvation Army, Unicef, Hillary Clinton, and top YouTubers PewDiePie and RomanAtwood! They have all used AudioJungle music to bring their videos and ads to life, and so can you. If you want to know more about it-check out our forum thread about the "Envato Famous 5" series.

We offer a selection of different royalty free music licensing to meet your project's unique needs, from explainer videos to mobile apps to television broadcast and everything in between.

Thinking of using a music track on YouTube? That's also no problem! We even have put together a great Buyer's Guide to YouTube Content ID Notices. It explains how you can easily clear any "matched third party content" notices you might find, and includes helpful tips on clearing these claims in advance.
